location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Farish, Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from James Farish, Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, acknowledging the receipt of a letter sent on 18 September and informing that the commission on the Ghelan [Gilan] silk cannot be allowed by the Government.
